history.author: notimefortrivia
history.post: Tersio, the logic of your argument is incorrect.  The Shroud cannot be forged because there was no mention of it in biblical texts and therefore would be unique?What is the evidence that yields that conclusion?  Your suggestion?It is clearly a post first century creation. Some time post the year 1000. The fact that monestaries and churches would “forge” artifacts is not and was not new.This is just one of them.
history.title: Tersio makes an important point
